CustomField.formula: if(Or(Text(Job_Type__c)=='Activism Advisory',Text(Job_Type__c)=='Corporate Alliances',Text(Job_Type__c)=='Debt Advisory',text(Job_Type__c)=='ESOP Corporate Finance',text(Job_Type__c)=='Financing',text(Job_Type__c)=='Partners',text(Job_Type__c)=='Real Estate Brokerage',text(Job_Type__c)=='Special Situations',text(Job_Type__c)=='Strategic Alternatives Study',text(Job_Type__c)=='Take Over Defense'),false,true)
CustomField.label: IsNBC_BasedOn_JobType
